ovdesc.p: This file is using for Fincen Reporting.

desc.p: This field shows the type of filing. Alpha numeric Maximum value is 1
Shows the Prior Report Document Control Number. Alpha Numeric Maximum value is 14
Shows types of transaction delivery or payment method. Alpha value with 5 characters.
Actual number of days in each compounding period. If compounded annually, then its 356 days. Numeric value with 4 characters. Date format

Describes the person involved in the transaction, Mandatory field Dropdown values are A - Person conducting transaction on own behalf B- Person conducting transaction for another C -Person on whose behalf transaction is conducted D -Courier service (private) Alpha value with 1 character
Shows whether the report has multiple transactions.
Shows the legal document issued state name. Alpha Numeric value with 3 characters.
Shows the legal document issued country name.Should have COUNTRY table attached.
This field holds the count of total number of cash transaction exceeding CTR threshold limit.
